dcmhome.addMoreUsers: Invite more participants by sending them the following link by email:
dcmhome.campaignNotStarted: Once the campaign is launched, some key data on the progress of your campaign are displayed here.

campaignStart.welcomeLinkExplain: By clicking on this link, you can sign up to this campaign. Send this link as part of an email to all potential participants.

emailText.defaultText:
Dear employee

{{ campaign.organization.name }} invites you to participate in the operational health campaign to the topic {{ campaign.title }}. This campaign is performed together with our partner YOUPERS.
emailText.label: Email body

emailInvite.explain: Automatically send email invitations to future campaign participants.
emailInvite.label: Email addresses of participants to invite, separated by comma, semicolon or space
emailInvite.testEmailSent:
Invitation sent to {{address}}.
Please review the invitation in your inbox.
emailInvite.title: Automatic email invitations to campaign

dcmhome.noCampaigns: You have not created any campaigns yet
dcmhome.noMessages: Your messages for the campaign participants are displayed here. Click on "Campaign message" to post a message.
dcmhome.noOffers: Once you, as a campaign leader, have recommended to perform an activity to the campaign participants or you, as an organizer, have invited the campaign participants to a joint campaign activity, the offered activities will be displayed here. Click on "Add offer" to offer an activity to the campaign participants.
dcmhome.noParticipants: There are no campaign participants yet
